item.title: Time Series Intuition
item.description:
AR(1) intuition

A simple way to think about an AR(1) process:

y_t = ρ y_{t-1} + ε_t

  • persistence comes from ρ
  • shock propagation depends on |ρ|
  • long-run variance increases with persistence

Questions:

  • When does AR(1) become non-stationary?
  • How does it differ from random walk?— date: ‘2026-02-26T19:13:40+08:00’ draft: true title: ‘Time Series Intuition’
